alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Niobrara; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:09PM MDT until May 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Niobrara County in east central Wyoming... Northwestern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... Northeastern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 508 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Fort Laramie, or 27 miles northwest of Torrington, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Lusk, Rawhide Buttes, Jay Em and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
